description: Lists the action executions that have occurred in a pipeline.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline for which you want to list action execution history.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Input information used to filter action execution history. pipelineExecutionId (string) --- The pipeline execution ID used to filter action execution history. latestInPipelineExecution (dict) --- The latest execution in the pipeline. The execution ID for the latest execution in the pipeline. The start time to filter on for the latest execution in the pipeline. Valid options: All Latest.

nested_params.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_params.description: The pipeline execution ID used to filter action execution history.

nested_params.name: latestInPipelineExecution
nested_params.description: The latest execution in the pipeline.

nested_params.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_params.description: The execution ID for the latest execution in the pipeline.

nested_params.name: startTimeRange
nested_params.description: The start time to filter on for the latest execution in the pipeline. Valid options:

nested_items.name: actionExecutionDetails
nested_items.description: The details for a list of recent executions, such as action execution ID.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_items.description: The pipeline execution ID for the action execution.

nested_items.name: actionExecutionId
nested_items.description: The action execution ID.

nested_items.name: pipelineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the pipeline where the action was run.

nested_items.name: stageName
nested_items.description: The name of the stage that contains the action.

nested_items.name: actionName
nested_items.description: The name of the action.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the action execution.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The last update time of the action execution.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user who changed the pipeline execution details.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the action execution. Status categories are InProgress, Succeeded, and Failed.

nested_items.name: actionTypeId
nested_items.description: Represents information about an action type.

nested_items.name: category
nested_items.description: A category defines what kind of action can be taken in the stage, and constrains the provider type for the action. Valid categories are limited to one of the following values.
Source.
Build.
Test.
Deploy.
Invoke.
Approval.
Compute.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The creator of the action being called. There are three valid values for the Owner field in the action category section within your pipeline structure: AWS, ThirdParty, and Custom. For more information, see Valid Action Types and Providers in CodePipeline.

nested_items.name: provider
nested_items.description: The provider of the service being called by the action. Valid providers are determined by the action category. For example, an action in the Deploy category type might have a provider of CodeDeploy, which would be specified as CodeDeploy. For more information, see Valid Action Types and Providers in CodePipeline.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: A string that describes the action version.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Configuration data for an action execution.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: resolvedConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration data for an action execution with all variable references replaced with their real values for the execution.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM service role that performs the declared action. This is assumed through the roleArn for the pipeline.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region for the action, such as us-east-1.

nested_items.name: inputArtifacts
nested_items.description: Details of input artifacts of the action that correspond to the action execution.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The artifact object name for the action execution.

nested_items.name: s3location
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 artifact location for the action execution.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 artifact bucket for an action's artifacts.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The artifact name.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The variable namespace associated with the action. All variables produced as output by this action fall under this namespace.

nested_items.name: outputArtifacts
nested_items.description: Details of output artifacts of the action that correspond to the action execution.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The artifact object name for the action execution.

nested_items.name: s3location
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 artifact location for the action execution.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 artifact bucket for an action's artifacts.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The artifact name.

nested_items.name: executionResult
nested_items.description: Execution result information listed in the output details for an action execution.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionId
nested_items.description: The action provider's external ID for the action execution.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionSummary
nested_items.description: The action provider's summary for the action execution.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionUrl
nested_items.description: The deepest external link to the external resource (for example, a repository URL or deployment endpoint) that is used when running the action.

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: Represents information about an error in CodePipeline.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The system ID or number code of the error.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The text of the error message.

nested_items.name: logStreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the log stream for the action compute.

nested_items.name: outputVariables
nested_items.description: The outputVariables field shows the key-value pairs that were output as part of that execution.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the amount of returned information is significantly large, an identifier is also returned and can be used in a subsequent ListActionExecutions call to return the next set of action executions in the list.
